document.full_text: the long wait for u.s. director terrence malick's return to the screen ended monday with a mix of loud applause and jeers, as his drama "the tree of life" appeared to split critics at the cannes film festival.
document.title: terrence malick's long-awaited return splits cannes
lines_and_colors: the long wait for u.s. director terrence malick's return to the screen ended monday with a mix of loud applause and jeers, as his drama "the tree of life" appeared to split critics at the cannes film festival.
